scenes.description: A dramatic dialogue between Shiori Novella and Nerissa Ravencroft in a gothic castle hall.
Shiori and Nerissa perform the song 'Be My Guest'.

subtitles.original: An angel came to me in my dreams...
subtitles.english: An angel came to me in my dreams...

subtitles.original:
...and told me of an enchanted book
with centuries of memories stored away here.
subtitles.english:
...and told me of an enchanted book
with centuries of memories stored away here.

subtitles.original:
Can you imagine the knowledge and stories
hidden in centuries of memories?
subtitles.english:
Can you imagine the knowledge and stories
hidden in centuries of memories?

subtitles.original:
With a prize like that,
I had to come find the book, no matter the danger.
subtitles.english:
With a prize like that,
I had to come find the book, no matter the danger.

subtitles.original:
Little could I have known
the true nature of the book, though...
subtitles.english:
Little could I have known
the true nature of the book, though...

subtitles.original: Enough!
subtitles.english: Enough!

subtitles.original: I've heard enough.
subtitles.english: I've heard enough.

subtitles.original: I believe you are who you say you are, a witch.
subtitles.english: I believe you are who you say you are, a witch.

subtitles.original: But I don't fully believe your childish story.
subtitles.english: But I don't fully believe your childish story.

subtitles.original:
No angel would ever lead a witch
to such a dangerous book.
subtitles.english:
No angel would ever lead a witch
to such a dangerous book.

subtitles.original:
And I can hardly believe it is just the book
and not myself you are after.
subtitles.english:
And I can hardly believe it is just the book
and not myself you are after.

subtitles.original:
It- It's true! An angel came to me
in my dreams and told me to come here.
subtitles.english:
It- It's true! An angel came to me
in my dreams and told me to come here.

subtitles.original:
I was drawn to that book
with all its power and stories.
subtitles.english:
I was drawn to that book
with all its power and stories.

subtitles.original: And, well, I guess you inside it.
subtitles.english: And, well, I guess you inside it.

subtitles.original: The powerful aura it gave off drew me right to it.
subtitles.english: The powerful aura it gave off drew me right to it.

subtitles.original:
How was I to know that the allure was thanks to
a demon trapped within its pages? Who would've guessed?
subtitles.english:
How was I to know that the allure was thanks to
a demon trapped within its pages? Who would've guessed?

subtitles.original:
Though, now that I recount my story,
it does seem it really was me who released you.
subtitles.english:
Though, now that I recount my story,
it does seem it really was me who released you.

subtitles.original:
Speaking of coming and going, now that you are free,
I think it is time I take my leave of this place.
subtitles.english:
Speaking of coming and going, now that you are free,
I think it is time I take my leave of this place.

subtitles.original:
I'm glad I was able to help free you from...
from whence you came!
subtitles.english:
I'm glad I was able to help free you from...
from whence you came!

subtitles.original: I didn't say you could leave!
subtitles.english: I didn't say you could leave!

subtitles.original: You may leave when I say you can leave.
subtitles.english: You may leave when I say you can leave.

subtitles.original: And stop your nervous fidgeting.
subtitles.english: And stop your nervous fidgeting.

subtitles.original:
I'm no fool. You think I didn't see you reaching
for your book of magic?
subtitles.english:
I'm no fool. You think I didn't see you reaching
for your book of magic?

subtitles.original:
You, a witch, should know better than anyone
that no amount of magic is powerful enough
to destroy a demon of my power.
subtitles.english:
You, a witch, should know better than anyone
that no amount of magic is powerful enough
to destroy a demon of my power.

subtitles.original:
However, you can take some small solace
in the fact that if I had wanted you dead,
you'd already be so.
subtitles.english:
However, you can take some small solace
in the fact that if I had wanted you dead,
you'd already be so.

subtitles.original:
The only reason you're still alive is because
you helped free me.
subtitles.english:
The only reason you're still alive is because
you helped free me.

subtitles.original:
Alas, I cannot allow a witch who so obviously
came with the intent to bind me to her will
leave here freely.
subtitles.english:
Alas, I cannot allow a witch who so obviously
came with the intent to bind me to her will
leave here freely.

subtitles.original:
Your story did little to convince me
your aims were otherwise.
subtitles.english:
Your story did little to convince me
your aims were otherwise.

subtitles.original: So, I will give you an ultimatum.
subtitles.english: So, I will give you an ultimatum.

subtitles.original: You serve me here in my hollow temple.
subtitles.english: You serve me here in my hollow temple.

subtitles.original: Love me.
subtitles.english: Love me.

subtitles.original: Adore me.
subtitles.english: Adore me.

subtitles.original: Worship me.
subtitles.english: Worship me.

subtitles.original: Every living day, give me all the love you have.
subtitles.english: Every living day, give me all the love you have.

subtitles.original: Or I can take your soul right now.
subtitles.english: Or I can take your soul right now.

subtitles.original: Your choice.
subtitles.english: Your choice.

subtitles.original: Kiara... I need you.
subtitles.english: Kiara... I need you.

subtitles.original:
Be My Guest
Lyrics, Music: Azari
subtitles.english:
Be My Guest
Lyrics, Music: Azari

subtitles.original:
Lost in the rain with no umbrella
Night snaps out your eyes
subtitles.english:
Lost in the rain with no umbrella
Night snaps out your eyes

subtitles.original:
Can't seem to find your way back home
Come in and be my guest
subtitles.english:
Can't seem to find your way back home
Come in and be my guest

subtitles.original:
Lost in the rain with no umbrella
Night snaps out your eyes
subtitles.english:
Lost in the rain with no umbrella
Night snaps out your eyes

subtitles.original:
Can't seem to find your way back home
Come in and be my guest
subtitles.english:
Can't seem to find your way back home
Come in and be my guest

subtitles.original:
Such a lovely smile spread across your face
But it's simple forgery
subtitles.english:
Such a lovely smile spread across your face
But it's simple forgery

subtitles.original:
If you need to hide from the world outside
Why not try to be my guest
subtitles.english:
If you need to hide from the world outside
Why not try to be my guest

subtitles.original:
Waiting all day long but your friends don't come
And you're left there all alone
subtitles.english:
Waiting all day long but your friends don't come
And you're left there all alone

subtitles.original:
Still you can't jump off from the high rooftops
So come on and be my guest
subtitles.english:
Still you can't jump off from the high rooftops
So come on and be my guest

subtitles.original:
Waiting all day long but your friends don't come
And you're left there all alone
subtitles.english:
Waiting all day long but your friends don't come
And you're left there all alone

subtitles.original:
Still you can't jump off from the high rooftops
So come on and be my guest
subtitles.english:
Still you can't jump off from the high rooftops
So come on and be my guest

subtitles.original: And like a cat the way I step and step and step
subtitles.english: And like a cat the way I step and step and step

subtitles.original: With carefully my feet go tap and tap and tap
subtitles.english: With carefully my feet go tap and tap and tap

subtitles.original: You'll follow nicely with the snap and snap and snap
subtitles.english: You'll follow nicely with the snap and snap and snap

subtitles.original: So lovely you'll be mesmerized by me
subtitles.english: So lovely you'll be mesmerized by me

subtitles.original:
My institutions peaceful as can be
Despite the way that it seems
subtitles.english:
My institutions peaceful as can be
Despite the way that it seems

subtitles.original:
Both our quotes and our supports
Will be concise, clear and clean
subtitles.english:
Both our quotes and our supports
Will be concise, clear and clean

subtitles.original:
Since we're only starting out
There's some probabilities
subtitles.english:
Since we're only starting out
There's some probabilities

subtitles.original:
But just listen up tonight
You'll have to stay up at least
subtitles.english:
But just listen up tonight
You'll have to stay up at least

subtitles.original:
No they don't like you when you know it's true
Still you're at their beck and call
subtitles.english:
No they don't like you when you know it's true
Still you're at their beck and call

subtitles.original:
Since you're desperately giving easily
Come inside and be my guest
subtitles.english:
Since you're desperately giving easily
Come inside and be my guest

subtitles.original:
You're the last to choose but you're left confused
Seems that someone took your share
subtitles.english:
You're the last to choose but you're left confused
Seems that someone took your share

subtitles.original:
If you won't accuse 'cause you don't have proof
Take a chance and be my guest
subtitles.english:
If you won't accuse 'cause you don't have proof
Take a chance and be my guest

subtitles.original:
On the way back home there's a sweet aroma
That tempts you off your path
subtitles.english:
On the way back home there's a sweet aroma
That tempts you off your path

subtitles.original: I can't help but laugh 'cause I know in fact
subtitles.english: I can't help but laugh 'cause I know in fact
